content: I don't have a personal preference, however, many harpists would argue that the development of lever harps has had the biggest impact on modern harp music. lever harps have made it easier for players to change keys and play a wider range of music without needing to retune their harp. it has also made learning the harp more accessible for beginners and has made the harp a more versatile instrument that can be used in various genres of music. however, other innovations such as electronic harps and carbon fiber harps have also made significant contributions to modern harp music.
